aboutBannerSubtitle: A journey through the world of luxury perfumes and elegance
aboutStoryP1: LUXE PARFUM started in 2010 with a clear vision: bringing the finest global perfumes to the Arab market. We believe perfume is not just a scent, but an expression of personality, elegance, and refined taste.
aboutStoryP2: Over the years, we have built strong relationships with the most famous French, Italian, and Eastern perfume houses, allowing us to offer an exclusive and diverse collection of luxury fragrances.
aboutStoryP3: Today, we proudly serve thousands of clients across the region, continuing our commitment to quality, authenticity, and premium service.
aboutVisionP1: We aim to be the number one destination for luxury perfume lovers in the Arab region, providing an exceptional shopping experience combining quality, authenticity, and premium service.
aboutVisionP2: We strive to promote a culture of refined fragrances and introduce our clients to the finest global releases, while preserving authentic Eastern perfume heritage.
aboutVisionP3: We believe everyone deserves to find their perfect fragrance that reflects their personality and unique style.
teamCEODesc: 20 years of experience in the perfume industry

contactFaq1Q: How can I track my order?
contactFaq1A: A tracking link will be sent to your email once the order is shipped. You can also track via your account on the website.
contactFaq2A: We accept Visa, Mastercard, Mada, Apple Pay, and Cash on Delivery.
contactFaq3Q: Do you ship outside Saudi Arabia?
contactFaq3A: Yes, we ship to all GCC countries. Contact us for shipping cost and delivery time.
